meta.content: Jeopardy Archive LaKedra Pam Charlie Santiuste Ben Raphel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7651.

td.p: LaKedra Pam, a physician from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
Charlie Santiuste, a relationship manager from Charlottesville, Virginia
Ben Raphel, a healthcare data analyst from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,201)

tr.td: DOGS IN HATS
THAT'S SOME SHAMELESS PANDERING
WHERE & WHEN
BEST SHORT FILM OSCARS
RECENT KIDS' BOOKS
MERCURY, VENUS OR MARS
